name: 2018 - The 3rd Asia-Pacific Conference on Intelligent Robot Systems ACIRS
content: Conference official website：http://www.acirs.org Meeting time：July 21-23, 2018 Meeting place：Singapore Metropolitan YMCA Published by：ACIRS 2017 Conference Proceedings has been included into IEEE Xplore Database and indexed by Ei Compendex and SCOPUS. ACIRS 2016 Conferece Proceedings has been included into IEEE Xplore,and being indexed by EI Compendex and Scopus. Paper Submission: June 30 2018 Submission instructions： 1.Prospective authors anr invited to submit original,high quality papers which is original and has not been submitted and published elsewhere 2.Manuscripts should be at least 5 full pages and at most 10pages. 3.The reviewing process of the ACIRS conference aims to provide authors with constructive feedback in their papers,eveb when a submission is rejected.All submissions will be subjected to double-blind peer reviews,who are expert or hace been experiencing in the related field for years.The accepted papers must be revised,taking into consideration the referees’ comments and suggestions,before inclusion in the conference proceedings. Conference Contact: Jenny Y.Zhou/Ms mailbox: acirs@young.ac.cn
